name: Notion Couple's Finance Tracker
description: Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for documents using Notion Database and a Google Doc!No Coding Required, No Technical Skills Needed, Just One-Click Automation!It requires 2 things: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g., {{InvoiceNumber}}, {{ClientName}}). Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching head
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Keep track of your income and expenses in one central location ğŸ’°; Fix your monthly savings goals to prioritize your savings ğŸ¯; Assess savings funds and contribution to total overall savings by him ğŸ™‹â€â™‚ï¸; Assess savings funds and contribution to total overall savings by her ğŸ™‹â€â™€ï¸; Access your couple's finance tracker from any device, anywhere ğŸ“±; Easy categorization for expenses and income for the couple.; Simple and intuitive interface for easy tracking.; Savings Funds tracking with progress bars.
